gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `ShareCapitalNumberShares` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `ShareCapitalNumberShares` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `ShareCapitalNumberSharesMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChangesNumberofSharesSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChangesNumberofSharesSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChangesNumberofSharesSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChangesNumberofSharesSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChangesNumberofSharesSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChangesNumberofSharesSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
